# Vignette Function

## Brief Description
The vignette function is used to create static HTML pages that explain the use of a R package.
Motivation and background information, examples and detailed explanations on how to use functions can be included in the vignette. The vignette function is used in conjunction with the vignette engine RMarkdown. 

## What Package Contains It
The vignette function is contained in the `tools` package of R.
